label: 动物伙伴进阶战技 CC Advanced Maneuvers

Badger Rage.name: 獾之狂暴 Badger Rage
Badger Rage.description:
需求 这只獾没有处于疲乏或者狂暴中。

@Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Features.Kgt1NyBesS3rohzb]{獾之狂暴 Badger Rage}

獾进入持续1分钟的纯粹狂暴状态，直到它无法感知到任何敌人为止，或者直到它失去意识为止，取其先者。它无法主动停止这种狂暴。在狂暴期间，獾受到下述效果的影响。

它的啮咬攻击造成4点额外伤害，爪抓攻击造成2点额外伤害。

它的AC承受-1的减值。

它不能使用带有专注特征的动作，除非它们同时也带有狂暴特征。动物伙伴即使在狂暴中也能进行搜索动作。

在它停止狂暴后，它在1分钟内不能再次使用獾之狂暴。

Bay.name: Bay
Bay.description: The shadow hound releases an eerie bay, attempting to Demoralize each foe in a 20-foot emanation. These Demoralize attempts don't require a language and don't take any penalty due to not sharing a language.

Bear Hug.name: 熊抱 Bear Hug
Bear Hug.description:
需求 这只熊的上一个动作是一次成功的爪抓打击。

熊对相同的目标再进行一次爪抓打击。如果这次攻击命中，目标会陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}中，如同熊成功地擒抱了目标。

Blood Feast.name: Blood Feast
Blood Feast.description: Your vampiric animal companion attacks a bleeding foe and drinks its blood. Your companion attempts a Strike against a creature currently taking persistent bleed damage. The Strike deals [[/r {2d8}[additional]]]{2d8 additional伤害}. If the Strike hits and deals damage, your vampiric animal companion gains temporary Hit Points equal to half your level that last for up to 1 minute.

Boar Charge.name: 凶猪冲锋 Boar Charge
Boar Charge.description: 猪伙伴沿直线行走2次，之后进行一次獠牙打击。只要猪伙伴移动至少20尺，它就会在攻击检定上获得+2环境加值。

Bony Constriction.name: Bony Constriction
Bony Constriction.description:
需求 The constrictor has a creature @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Grabbed]{擒抱 Grabbed}.

The skeletal constrictor deals [[/r {12}[piercing]]]{12 piercing Damage} to the grabbed creature with its sharp ribs; the creature must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(12+@actor.level+@actor.abilities.con.mod)|basic:true] save. If the constrictor is a specialized companion, increase this damage to [[/r {20}[piercing]]]{20}. This uses a trained DC using the constrictor's Constitution modifier, or an expert DC (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(14+@actor.level+@actor.abilities.con.mod)|basic:true]) if the constrictor is specialized.

Bouncing Slam.name: Bouncing Slam
Bouncing Slam.description: The gibtas Leaps toward a Medium or smaller creature, landing in the creature's space and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shoving} the creature. If the Shove fails, the gibtas bounces out of the target's square to an adjacent square of the target's choosing.

Breath Weapon.name: 喷吐武器 Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description:
频率 每小时一次

骑乘龙兽喷出30尺锥形的火焰，对区域内的所有生物（基础反射豁免）造成每2个龙兽等级1d6点火焰伤害。该能力基于受训熟练等级计算DC并使用龙兽的体质调整值，若龙兽被特化则基于专家熟练等级计算DC。

Careful Withdraw.name: Careful Withdraw
Careful Withdraw.description: The legchair carefully extricates you from a dangerous situation. It Steps twice and then Strides.

Cat Pounce.name: 猫之猛扑 Cat Pounce
Cat Pounce.description: 猫咪行走并攻击。如果它开始猫之猛扑时处于无踪的状态，那么这个状态会持续到攻击结束为止。

Constrict.name: 紧勒 Constrict
Constrict.description:
需求 这只蛇擒抱了比它更小的生物。

蛇对被擒抱的生物造成[[/r 12]]点钝击伤害；这只生物必须尝试一次基础强韧豁免。如果这只蛇是一只特化动物伙伴，这个伤害提升至[[/r 20]]点。

Darting Attack.name: 突进攻击 Darting Attack
Darting Attack.description: 迅猛龙快步至多10尺并紧接着进行打击，或者进行攻击并紧接着快步至多10尺。

Death Roll.name: 死亡翻滚 Death Roll
Death Roll.description:
需求 鳄鱼擒抱了一个生物。

鳄鱼伙伴收起四肢并快速翻滚，扭动猎物。鳄鱼伙伴仅限一次獠牙打击对抗被擒抱的生物，且在此次攻击检定上获得+2环境加值。若命中，它还会将该生物击@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}；若失手，它会放开该生物。

Defensive Curl.name: Defensive Curl
Defensive Curl.description: The pangolin coils into a ball to defend itself. It gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC. Any creature that hits the pangolin with a melee unarmed attack while it's in its Defensive Curl take [[/r {2d6}[persistent,bleed]]]{2d6} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续流血伤害}. The pangolin can't move, use its unarmed attacks, or take other actions that require it to use its limbs while in its Defensive Curl, but it can unfurl as a single action, ending the effects of Defensive Curl.

Disgusting Gallop.name: Disgusting Gallop
Disgusting Gallop.description: The zombie mount Strides twice, spraying putrid spittle as it runs. Once during this movement, choose a creature adjacent to the zombie mount. The spittle splashes on it, and the creature must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(12+@actor.level+@actor.abilities.con.mod)] save or be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Sickened]{Sickened 1}. The creature is then temporarily immune to the spittle for 24 hours. This uses a trained DC using the zombie mount's Constitution modifier, or an expert DC (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(14+@actor.level+@actor.abilities.con.mod)]) if the mount is specialized.

Distracting Spray.name: Distracting Spray
Distracting Spray.description:
The capybara sprays an adjacent target with its scent glands. The target must attempt a Fortitude save. Wiping off the musk takes an Interact action and ends the effect. This uses a trained DC using the capybara's Constitution modifier or an expert DC if the capybara is specialized.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} for 1 round.

Failure The creature is clumsy 1 for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2} for 1 minute.

Feast on the Fallen.name: Feast on the Fallen
Feast on the Fallen.description:
频率 每小时一次

Trigger A creature adjacent to the vulture is reduced to 0 Hit Points

The vulture consumes a piece of the defeated foe, regaining [[/r 18]] Hit Points. If the vulture is a specialized animal companion, increase the Hit Points regained to [[/r 30]].

Flyby Attack.name: Flyby Attack
Flyby Attack.description: The bird Flies and makes a talon Strike at any point along the way.

Frightening Display.name: 惊骇姿态 Frightening Display
Frightening Display.description: 你的猿伙伴发出咆哮并作出威胁性的姿态，吓得敌人失去平衡。猿伙伴尝试对目标生物进行@Compendium[pf2e.action-macros.nEwqNNWX6scLt4sc]{挫败士气: 威吓}；这个动作获得视觉特征且不需要语言。在目标由于该能力而陷入惊惧期间，该目标对你的猿伙伴陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}。

Gallop.name: 飞奔 Gallop
Gallop.description: 马儿以获得+10尺环境加值的速度进行两次行走。

Gnaw.name: Gnaw
Gnaw.description:
需求 The animal companion's last action was a successful jaws Strike.

The Strike's target takes 1d6 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Damage} bleed damage and takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speed until it removes the bleed damage. If the hyena is a specialized animal companion, the persistent bleed damage increases to 2d6.

Grab and Sting.name: 螯与刺 Grab and Sting
Grab and Sting.description: 蝎子伙伴用它的螯把敌人固定在原地以便用尾刺攻击。蝎子伙伴进行一次螯爪打击。若打击命中，目标生物会自动被蝎子伙伴@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}，然后蝎子进行一次尾刺打击对抗敌人。擒抱状态持续至你的下个回合结束为止。

Grabbing Trunk.name: Grabbing Trunk
Grabbing Trunk.description: The elephant grabs its foe with its trunk and carries it off. The elephant uses Athletics to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Grapple]{Grapple} a creature up to two sizes smaller than the elephant in its trunk. If its target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Grabbed]{擒抱 Grabbed} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Restrained]{Restrained}, the elephant repositions the target to another space in the elephant's reach.

Grip Throat.name: Grip Throat
Grip Throat.description: The hand attempts to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Grapple]{Grapple} a Medium or smaller creature by the throat. If the Grapple succeeds, in addition to the normal effects, the creature has difficulty speaking. While it remains @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Grabbed]{擒抱 Grabbed} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Restrained]{Restrained} by the hand, it must spend an extra action to perform any action that has the verbal trait.

Gulp Blood.name: 饮血 Gulp Blood
Gulp Blood.description:
需求 水缚灵上一个动作是一次对敌人的成功啃咬攻击。

水缚灵获得[[/r 2d8 #Temporary Hit Points]]{2d8}持续1轮的临时生命值，并且敌人受到[[/r {2d6}[persistent,bleed]]]{2d6} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续流血伤害}。如果水缚灵具有特化，水缚灵取而代之获得[[/r 3d8 #Temporary Hit Points]]{3d8}临时生命值，并且目标受到[[/r {3d6}[persistent,bleed]]]{3d6} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续流血伤害}。如果目标生物完全没有维持生命所需的体液，此能力可能不会生效，由GM决定。

Hustle.name: Hustle
Hustle.description: The beetle moves at incredible speed. It Strides three times.

Knockdown.name: 击倒 Knockdown
Knockdown.description:
需求 这只动物伙伴的上一个动作是一次成功的啃咬打击。

狼自动将它啮咬攻击的目标击至@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。

Lumbering Knockdown.name: Lumbering Knockdown
Lumbering Knockdown.description: Your triceratops Strides up to 10 feet, then makes a horns Strike. On a success, the target is knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}.

Lurching Rush.name: Lurching Rush
Lurching Rush.description: The monitor lizard Strides and then makes a jaws Strike. If it moved at least 20 feet away from its starting position, it gains a +2 circumstance bonus to this attack roll.

Overwhelm.name: Overwhelm
Overwhelm.description: The tyrannosaurus bears down on an enemy and pins it with its jaws. The tyrannosaurus makes a jaws Strike; on a hit, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Grabbed]{擒抱 Grabbed}.

Pick at the Meat.name: Pick at the Meat
Pick at the Meat.description:
需求 The animal companion's last action was a successful jaws Strike.

Your bird picks at the wound it just created. The target of its jaws Strike takes [[/r {1d8}[persistent,bleed]]]{1d8 bleed伤害}, or [[/r {2d8}[persistent,bleed]]]{2d8 bleed伤害} if the bird is specialized.

Pterosaur Swoop.name: Pterosaur Swoop
Pterosaur Swoop.description: The pterosaur Flies up to its Speed and makes one beak Strike at any point during that movement.

Rhinoceros Charge.name: Rhinoceros Charge
Rhinoceros Charge.description: The rhino Strides and makes a horn Strike at the end of its Stride. As long as the rhino moved at least 20 feet, the horn Strike deals 1d8 additional piercing damage, or 2d8 additional damage if your rhino is nimble or savage.

Sand Stride.name: Sand Stride
Sand Stride.description: The camel Strides twice with a +5-foot circumstance bonus to Speed, ignoring difficult terrain caused by rubble, sand, and uneven ground made of earth and stone.

Screaming Skull.name: Screaming Skull
Screaming Skull.description: The skeleton removes its skull and throws it, making a jaws Strike with a range of 20 feet. Regardless of whether it hits, the target and all enemies within 10 feet must attempt a Will save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2} on a critical failure. This uses a trained DC using the skeleton's Charisma modifier or an expert DC if the skeleton is specialized. At the start of the skeleton's next turn, the head bounces, rolls, or flies back to reattach. The skeleton is blind while its head is away.

Shred.name: 肢解 Shred
Shred.description: 鲨鱼撕扯敌人的伤口，造成额外的伤害。鲨鱼伙伴的打击目标受到[[/r 1d8]]点挥砍伤害；成年鲨鱼伙伴造成[[/r 2d8]]点；特化伙伴造成[[/r 3d8]]点。

Snatch and Zap.name: Snatch and Zap
Snatch and Zap.description: The Ulgrem-Lurann bites down hard and unleashes an electrical discharge. It makes a jaws Strike. If the Strike hits, the target creature automatically becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Grabbed]{擒抱 Grabbed} by the Ulgrem-Lurann and takes [[/r {1d4}[electricity]]]{1d4 electricity伤害} ([[/r {2d4}[electricity]]] for a mature Ulgrem-Lurann or [[/r {3d4}[electricity]]] for a specialized companion). The grabbed condition lasts until the end of your next turn, though the Ulgrem-Lurann can use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Grapple]{Grapple} to attempt to extend the duration as normal.

Take a Taste.name: Take a Taste
Take a Taste.description:
需求 The zombie has a creature @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Grabbed]{擒抱 Grabbed} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Restrained]{Restrained}.

The zombie tries to grasp and bite a creature. The zombie makes a jaws Strike against the creature. This Strike uses the same statistics as its normal melee Strike, except its damage die is 1d10 and it deals piercing damage.

Tearing Clutch.name: Tearing Clutch
Tearing Clutch.description: The terror bird makes a beak Strike; on a successful hit, the target takes [[/r {2d6}[persistent,bleed]]]{2d6} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续流血伤害}.

Telekinetic Assault.name: Telekinetic Assault
Telekinetic Assault.description:
Frequency 每小时一次

Your ghost unleashes a flurry of emotions, causing small objects and debris to fly about in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20], dealing [[/r {1d6}[bludgeoning]]]{1d6 bludgeoning伤害} for every 2 levels the ghost has (basic Reflex save). This uses a trained DC using the ghost's Charisma modifier or an expert DC if the ghost is specialized.

Throw Rock.name: 投石 Throw Rock
Throw Rock.description: 树人幼苗捡起触及范围内或取出已经存好的岩石，将其投掷出去进行远程投石打击，这造成基础1d6点钝击伤害，射程增量为30尺。

Tongue Pull.name: Tongue Pull
Tongue Pull.description: The cave gecko snaps out its tongue, attempting to pull a foe within 10 feet toward it. The gecko attempts an Athletics check against the foe's Fortitude DC. On a success, the cave gecko pulls the foe next to it. This movement is forced movement. On a critical success, the foe is also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed} until the beginning of your next turn.

Ultrasonic Scream.name: Ultrasonic Scream
Ultrasonic Scream.description:
The moth flaps its wings and emits ultrasonic squeaks that scramble the senses of nearby creatures. Choose one creature within 30 feet of the moth. That creature must attempt a Fortitude save. This uses a trained DC using the moth's Constitution modifier or an expert DC if the moth is specialized.

Success The target treats all creatures as @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Concealed]{Concealed} on its next attack before the start of your next turn.

Failure The target treats all creatures as concealed until the start of your next turn.

Critical Failure As failure, and the target is also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Stunned]{Stunned 1}.

Unnerving Screech.name: Unnerving Screech
Unnerving Screech.description:
Your skeletal bird of prey makes an earsplitting, unnatural screech, deafening and startling an enemy within 30 feet. The target must attempt a Fortitude save. The target is then temporarily immune for 1 hour. The frightened condition is a mental, emotion, and fear effect, but the creature can still be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Deafened]{Deafened} if it's immune to these.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is deafened for 1 round and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}.

Failure The target is deafened for 1 minute and frightened 1.

Critical Failure The target is deafened for 10 minutes and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}.

Wing Thrash.name: 翼击 Wing Thrash
Wing Thrash.description: 你的蝙蝠伙伴狂野地扇动双翼，对至多3名相邻的敌人作出翼拍打击。每次攻击都会计入蝙蝠的多次攻击减值，但只会在上述所有攻击都作出之后才会增加。
